algo_summary: C++ implementations of various MHS algorithms
algo_description:
Available algorithms:
  • pmmcs: parallelized version of the MMCS algorithm. Serial version introduced in Efficient algorithms for dualizing large-scale hypergraphs by Murakami and Uno.
  • prs: parallelized version of the RS algorithm. Serial version introduced in Efficient algorithms for dualizing large-scale hypergraphs by Murakami and Uno.
  • fka: the A algorithm from On the complexity of dualization of monotone disjunctive normal forms, Fredman, M. and Khachiyan, L.
  • berge: sequential algorithm, widely published, i.e. in Hypergraphs: combinatorics of finite sets, C. Berge, 1984.
  • bm: global parallel algorithm from A fast and simple parallel algorithm for the monotone duality problem by E. Boros and K. Makino.

algo_authors.name: Andrew Gainer-Dewar, Ph.D.
algo_authors.organization: UConn Health Center for Quantitative Medicine
